input.sentences: the cemetery where the burial took place .
the new grave site of a person recently buried .
a group of mourners talk outside after the service .
a bit of refreshment for the mourners after the dedication .
the cleric who preformed the service .
output.sentences: It was a beautiful day for a funeral.
The flowers lain all around his mother's grave were a bright contrast to the sadness he felt.
Though he was surrounded by family and friends, all he felt was the empty space left by he absence.
It was strange to have all of these people he barely knew talking about how wonderful she was, he knew.
Perhaps later in life he would be thankful for the closure of performing the service himself, but today he was just numb.
